Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2012...
Had first career hit on 6/17/2013, off Diego Guerrero (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/24/2013, off Jose Valverde (STL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/2014, hitting .611 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 8/8/2014 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/2014, hitting .727 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 4/29/2016 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/10/2016 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2017, hitting .545 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2017, hitting .478 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Los Angeles (A) on 6/30/2017 (Going to LAA: SS J. Profar. Going to PIT: SS R. Gotay, 3B K. Cowart, CF E. Marzilli, 2B R. Cano, RF I. Boone Jr.)...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Minnesota on 4/20/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 2018...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 4/16/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/22/2019, hitting .542 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/29/2019, hitting .476 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 7/25/2019...
Had 6 hits with 5 RBI against Boston on 7/5/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/11/2020, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/15/2020 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Hit 3 homeruns against Baltimore, driving in 5 runs on 9/26/2020...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2020, hitting .305 with 10 HR, 31 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 7/27/2022...
Won World Championship with Los Angeles (A) in 2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2023, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Seattle, driving in 3 runs on 6/20/2023...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
